app.title: ChatOn - AI Chat Bot Assistant
app.description:
Welcome to the world of AI-powered assistance! Meet ChatOn, your chat AI and virtual assistant designed to streamline your daily tasks. Built on the latest GPT-4o, o4-mini, Sonar, Claude 3.7, and DeepSeek-R1 technologies, ChatOn offers a responsive AI experience that’s highly effective. Whether you need help drafting emails, creating visuals, or generating ideas, turn to this chatbot for help.

PIC TRANSFORMER:
Give your photos a trendy makeover with Pic Transformer! Upload your picture, pick a style—Japanese Cartoon, Plushy, Cyberpunk, or Action Figure with the app's AI Action Figure Maker—and let your pocket chatbot do the rest! In the latest pic transformer feature, you can meet your toy-sized self with an AI action figure generator, become a cute plushie, step into the cyber-future, and so much more.

AI IMAGE GENERATOR:
Create visuals that match your style with our AI picture generator. Just tweak the image generator chat settings and turn your ideas into pics of any size and style.

IMAGE-TO-TEXT CONVERTER:
Our chatbot can assist in extracting text from pics, letting you insert it into the chat AI instantly.

AI WRITING ASSISTANT:
ChatOn, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, offers a versatile AI writing assistant that helps with any writing project, from emails and speeches to social posts and poems. You can pick the length and tone of the chatbot’s answers and get ideas for follow-up questions to keep your chat going.

WEB ANALYZER:
The chatbot AI, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, is ideal for finding online answers to questions. From getting to know the weather to discovering the latest fashion trends, our chatbot is here for you.

DOC MASTER:
ChatOn can summarize, rewrite, and translate any doc. And if you have questions about the file’s content, the chatbot AI will answer them all.

YOUTUBE PRO:
Share any YouTube link with the chatbot, and it will summarize, translate, or answer questions about the video content.

GRAMMAR AND SPELLING CHECKER:
Get ready to boost your skills in AI writing with ChatOn, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, as it can analyze your written work and offer suggestions to help you improve it.

AI REWRITER:
The chatbot AI can rewrite your text, making it more engaging and professional right in the chat.

SOCIAL MEDIA POSTS CREATOR:
Crafting social media posts becomes easy with ChatOn. Built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, this AI writing assistant helps you create content for Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, or X profiles. And if you want an eye-catching image to go with it, our AI image generator can create one in seconds.

TEXT SUMMARIZER:
ChatOn’s summarization features, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, identify key information and present it in a concise way.

MATH GURU:
Built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, this chat AI helps you grasp the subject matter rather than simply get immediate solutions. You can even visualize math problems with our AI picture generator to make understanding easier.

EXPERT CODER:
ChatOn can write and check any programming code, preventing potential bugs.

CV AND COVER LETTER BUILDER:
Create a pro resume and cover letter that will show your talents and experience in the best light possible. For a visual touch, use our AI image generator to create graphics that make your CV stand out.

EMAIL GENERATOR:
Built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, ChatOn crafts well-structured, compelling emails suited to your needs. You can enhance these emails with unique visuals created with our AI picture generator.

Whether you’re chatting, creating content, or generating images, ChatOn offers an all-in-one chatbot AI solution for your daily productivity. Just type your request or pick from the app’s 100+ ready-made prompts, and the bot will assist you.

Explore the potential of GPT-4o, GPT-4, and Claude in ChatOn and discover how this intelligent assistant can help you.

Download ChatOn, start chatting in the AI chat or creating images in the AI picture generator, and boost your productivity here and now!

app.summary: Get multiple AI tools in one AI chatbot assistant: write AI text, chat, & more

reviews.text: You do realize that you're charging for what is available for free on the Internet, right? You started demanding that I buy a subscription. No thanks. I went to the free online site, bookmarker it, and added it to one of my home screens. No subscription required. But it gets 5 stars, not for your paid app for a free AI, but for the AI, itself.

No experience, every single ai chat app is the exact same. Same layout, same messages, all powered by the same company an os, but all charge different amounts for the trial period, even though they are all the exact same. I wanted to try this app out but I will not subscribe to an app, and I should not have to sign up for a free trial, just put a timer on the license, and make the app inoperable without paying for it.

it's a little tricky sometimes to get the right wording of prompts, but once you figure it out it gets easier and easier to generate what you want. For images, it seems to not be as good as dedicated image generators. Overall I have been enjoying my experience. It's cool to figure out unexpected ways for it to be a useful tool. It has actually been the brainstorming assistant I needed to help me get from a basic novel plot idea to an entire outline of the full book, and helps with research

So far, the model gives decent initial answers. But if you ask additional questions in the same line, the model seems to have short-term memory loss. Then when called out on contradictions or incongruencies, it falls back on the typical "As an AI model, I do not have the ability". Of course, this is after having already done the thing is is now saying it doesn't have the ability to do... Fine if you just take answers at face value.

Really puts my words into how I see the situation or potential situations and makes them formal and the words really stick out to the reader. Not only does it make better sense(because even when I can't articulate the word, AI picks it up and helps me along the way.) Also if you don't like the first version they send just say oh no let's try again with this also in the context. Really though if it doesn't fit it in the first time, it will definitely get it with a little more of your context.

The app works fast!!!! You have to pick the different app for the different purpose. Image generation a separate app from researching what is going on in the world today. Depending on what you choose you may not get a response or you might get a different response. It doesn't read aloud so if you can't read the words good luck. There's a tiny little button to make it read aloud and it sounds unnatural, button is hard to find for visually impaired. I canceled ...hopefully refund will come.

Extremely versatile, with many practical uses. It's not quite the computer from Star Trek NG just yet, but is further along than I expected to see in my lifetime. It isn't all-knowing, but can provide at least cursory information on just about any topic one could bring up- will modestly acknowledge its limitations even. The huge milestones, however, are its high proficiency for interpreting and troubleshooting program languages, and how natural it converses with the user. Well done!

This is an amazing app, twenty seconds out of my time and it game me a list of five perfect movies for a movie night! 5-10 minutes and it can Evan write an essay! If your wondering if you should get this app I would highly recommend it. Nothing's wrong with it, it's quick, smart, nice, useful, and free! The best A.I. experience that I have ever had and probably ever will have! But it would be nice to be able to do more than a few things on it without the unlimited access.

Helped me write a formal cover letter and resume with just a handful of facts that I input and after cutting and pasting it's responses into my word processing app, it totally made me look very intelligent and educated when I submitted it. Also, it answers absolutely anything I have trouble with from car troubles to legal issues, and everything in-between. Try it out, it's amazing. It's one of my favorite apps that I can't do without. It's like having a know it all in your pocket!!! I promise.

I have been a paying customer of this service for some time. However, approximately a week ago, I noticed that the background color was changed from black to white. Due to my eye sensitivity, I strongly prefer the dark background. Unfortunately, there is no option available to switch back to the dark theme. Additionally, I used to enjoy the feature where the AI bot would read the responses aloud with sound. I kindly request that these features be reinstated for a better user experience. Thank yo

app.developerLegalAddress: 66 W Flagler St, Miami, FL 33130-1807, United States
app.recentChanges:
Hello there! In this version, you'll find:
· Pic transformer—reimagine your photos with artistic styles
· Minor bug fixes and UI improvements

Have comments or suggestions? Don’t hesitate to reach out!
Thank you for choosing ChatOn!
app.AIReview:
ChatOn - AI Chat Bot Assistant Review

Overview

ChatOn, currently boasting 24,919,238 installs and a solid 4.542197/5 rating from over 364,507 users, positions itself as a comprehensive AI chatbot assistant built upon a suite of powerful language models including GPT-4o, o4-mini, Sonar, Claude 3.7, and DeepSeek-R1. The app’s core promise is to simplify daily tasks through intelligent automation – from drafting emails and generating creative content to crafting visuals. The significant install count suggests a strong initial appeal, but the question remains: does ChatOn live up to its ambitious claims and deliver a consistently useful experience? This review delves into all aspects of the app, assessing its features, usability, performance, and overall value.

Key Features

ChatOn’s feature set is undeniably broad, reflecting the multitude of AI technologies it integrates. The core functionalities can be broken down as follows:

  • Text Generation: Utilizing GPT-4o and other models, ChatOn excels at generating different types of text content – emails, articles, social media posts, poems, code snippets, and more. Users can specify tone, length, and subject matter with varying degrees of control.
  • Image Transformation (Pic Transformer): The integrated “Pic Transformer” allows users to upload images and apply trendy visual filters and effects using AI. This is a notable addition, offering a creative tool directly within the chatbot interface.
  • Chat & Conversation: The app functions primarily as a conversational AI assistant, allowing for natural language interactions across various tasks.
  • Idea Generation: Users can prompt ChatOn to brainstorm ideas for projects, marketing campaigns, or even personal endeavors.
  • Multi-Model Support: A key selling point is the integration of multiple large language models (LLMs). While not explicitly detailed within the app itself, this suggests potential future enhancements and model switching capabilities based on task requirements.

Strengths

Several aspects contribute to ChatOn's popularity:

  • Diverse AI Engine: The combination of GPT-4o, o4-mini, Sonar, Claude 3.7, and DeepSeek-R1 represents a significant advantage. This variety theoretically allows for optimal performance across different tasks – some models might be better suited for creative writing while others shine in code generation or data analysis (though this isn't fully explored within the current app interface).
  • Pic Transformer Integration: The inclusion of an image transformation tool adds considerable value, catering to users who want a quick and easy way to enhance their photos. This is a differentiator from many basic chatbot apps.
  • High Install Numbers: 24,919,238 installs demonstrate significant user interest and likely indicate a functional core offering.
  • Free Access: The app's free-to-use model removes the barrier to entry for potential users, allowing them to explore its capabilities without financial commitment.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, ChatOn has several areas needing attention:

  • Lack of Model Transparency: The description mentions multiple LLMs but doesn’t provide details on how users can select or influence which model is being used. This opacity could frustrate power users who desire granular control over the AI's behavior.
  • Limited Context Management: During extended conversations, ChatOn occasionally loses context, requiring repeated prompts to reiterate previous instructions. Improved memory and context retention would greatly enhance usability.
  • Pic Transformer Limitations: While functional, the Pic Transformer’s selection of filters is somewhat limited compared to dedicated photo editing apps. More sophisticated customization options are needed.
  • Inconsistent Response Quality: The quality of responses varies significantly depending on the prompt's clarity and complexity. Better guidance for users on crafting effective prompts would be beneficial.
  • Interface Clutter: The interface, while functional, feels somewhat cluttered with multiple options and buttons, potentially overwhelming new users.

User Experience

The user experience is generally straightforward. The chat interface is clean and intuitive, allowing for seamless conversation flow. Navigating between the core chatbot functionality and the Pic Transformer is simple. However, as mentioned previously, the lack of clear model selection and occasional context loss detract from an otherwise positive UX. The app's responsiveness is respectable, with most prompts generating a response within seconds, although this can fluctuate based on server load.

Value for Money

As a free application, ChatOn offers considerable value to users seeking basic AI assistance. The breadth of features—including text generation and image transformation—makes it a compelling option for casual users or those experimenting with AI tools. However, for power users who require advanced control over the underlying models or demand consistently high-quality outputs across complex tasks, premium options offered by other specialized AI platforms might provide greater value.

Conclusion

ChatOn is a promising AI chatbot assistant that leverages a diverse range of cutting-edge technologies. Its popularity is justified by its core functionality – text generation and image transformation – and the accessibility afforded by its free model. While areas for improvement exist, particularly regarding context management, model transparency, and interface streamlining, ChatOn represents a solid entry point into the world of AI assistance. The app’s continued development and refinement will undoubtedly enhance its value proposition over time. It's a worthwhile download for those curious about AI and seeking a readily available tool to augment their daily workflow, but users should manage expectations regarding consistency and advanced control features.
